channel.title: Comments on: A Bend Techie’s Big Dream: More Girls in STEM Careers

item.title: By: Verdie
item.dc:creator: Verdie
item.description: You did a excellent job! This post seem very good.

item.title: By: Big Dream Film Showing Friday in Bend | BendTECH
item.dc:creator: Big Dream Film Showing Friday in Bend | BendTECH
item.description: […] The movie, which follows its subjects from small town Iowa to the Middle East, immerses viewers in a world designed by and for the next generation of girls. It’s a key part of the larger Big Dream movement, which Bend’s own Rane Johnson, principal research director for Microsoft Research, helped launch. […]
